Name: Terrorteeth
Description: Spooky greetings to you, I'm Terrorteeth, Sometimes I dance the monster mash. My favourite Halloween was a few years ago when I put a lot of work into my costume, dressed up as a scary Spider-Man and ate an entire pizza all to myself. My favourite scary movie is Poltergeist

Name: Qulyabanı
Description: Bonjour, my name is Qulyabanı, I enjoy being spooky and love to watch Jumanji, I wish there was a version I could play online. The best Halloween I've ever had is when I dressed up as  a dog then went to a party in a discotheque with the cast of Electric Boogaloo . My favourite scary movie is The Little Mermaid, those talking fish people really freak me out.

Name: Smoketooth
Description: Yo Yo, it's me Smoketooth, I enjoy being scary and love to prank call people and pretend I'm a ghost. One Halloween I ended up partying with Dustin Diamond! My favourite scary movie is The Silence of the Lambs

Name: Decapitron
Description: Boo, I go by the name of Decapitron, Halloween is my favourite day of the year, I take the whole day off work and then get all of my friends round to my house, set off fireworks and watch scary movies! Thinking back, my best Halloween was when I dressed up like a very scary elmo then went to a spooky tea party. My favourite scary movie is 28 Days Later

Name: Manda
Description: Ola, my name is Manda, I really like to cook Goulash. The greatest Halloween ever was when I dressed up like a angry Unicorn and went to a party in a spooky castle. My favourite scary movie is It, but not the crappy remake with the little kid from Stranger Things in it.

Name: Revoky
Description: Hello, my name is Revoky, Halloween is my favourite day of the year, I take the whole day off work and then watch scary movies. The best Halloween I've ever had is when I dressed up like a particularly frightening poltergeist then went to Nicolas Cage's house and got to hold his Razzie. My favourite scary movie is Jaws, I am terrified of sharks!

Name: Spogelse
Description: Bonjour, I go by the name of Spøgelse, Halloween is my favourite time of the year, I enjoy being especially spooky and love to spend time staying in haunted hotels. The greatest Halloween ever was when I dressed up like a magic Unicorn and snuck into the local zoo to kiss a crocodile as a dare! My favourite scary movie is E.T

Name: Damien
Description: Ola Amigo, I am Damien, Frightening people is my favourite thing to do and Halloween is my favourite day of the year, I decorate my house, carve pumpkins and in the evening I love to Prank call people and pretend I am calling from the future! Thinking back, my best Halloween was when I dressed up as a particularly frightening Princess and ended up in Jeff Goldblum's haunted castle, drinking shots of tequila until the sun came up!

Name: Chucky
Description: Ola, I am Chucky, Halloween is my favourite day of the year, I take the whole day off work and then watch Jumanji, I wish there was a version I could play online. My all time favourite Halloween is when I put a lot of work into my costume, dressed up as Keith Richards then went to a party in a discotheque with Hurley from Lost . My favourite scary movie is The Shining

Name: Spookghetti
Description: Boo, I go by the name of Spookghetti, Halloween is my favourite time of the year, I love to wear a cape and hang out at the local blood bank! My all time favourite Halloween is the year I dressed up as a possessed Phil Mickelson and went to a party in Luigi's mansion. My favourite scary movie is Candyman

Name: Clarice
Description: Ola, my name is Clarice, Frightening people is my favourite thing to do and Halloween is my favourite day of the year, I decorate my house, carve pumpkins and in the evening I party hard! My fondest Halloween memory is when I dressed up as a Freddy Mercury and went rollerskating.

Name: Addams
Description: Bonjour, my name is Addams, I like to prank call people and pretend I can see them. The greatest Halloween ever was when I dressed up as Betelgeuse and hid under my bed.

Name: Briesmonis
Description: Yo, I go by the name of Briesmonis, I enjoy being the spookiest of all my friends and really like to prank call people and pretend I can see them. The best Halloween I've ever had was when I dressed up as a Lady Gaga, went to a party, got bored and was in bed by 10PM. My favourite scary movie is The Others

Name: Cady
Description: Yo, I go by the name of Cady, I like to sit alone in the dark, listening for ghosts. My best Halloween memory is from when I put a lot of effort into my outfit, dressing up as a cute poltergeist then went to Stone Cold Steve Austin's haunted penthouse to watch him eat 16 apples in under an hour. My favourite scary movie is Psycho

Name: Geoffrey Spooky Fingers
Description: Spooky greetings to you, I'm Geoffrey Spooky Fingers, Halloween is my favourite time of the year, I like to visit Transylvania. My all time favourite Halloween is when I dressed up like a magic Hulk Hogan then spent the evening howling at the moon. My favourite scary movie is The Evil Dead

Name: Fester
Description: Yo Yo, it's me Fester, Halloween is my favourite holiday, I really love to sit alone in the dark  listening for ghosts. The best Halloween I've ever had is when I  dressed up as a lion tamer and went to a party in a very haunted house.

Name: Sir Spookalot
Description: Ola Amigo, I am Sir Spookalot, I enjoy being frightening and love to get all of my friends round to my house, set off fireworks and watch scary movies! Thinking back, my best Halloween was when I dressed up like a zombie lion tamer and ended up in Pat Sharpe's fun house, drinking shots of tequila until the sun came up! My favourite scary movie is Troll Hunter

Name: Monstre
Description: Hello, my name is Monstre, I enjoy scaring people and love to hit up the neighbourhood, trick or treating until the sun comes up. My favourite Halloween was when I spent the evening cuddling a pug dressed as a bear.

Name: Monstruo
Description: Hello, my name is Monstruo, I enjoy being frightening and love to eat cheese before I go to bed. The greatest Halloween ever was when got dressed up as Boris Yeltsin and went to Halle Berry's house to watch Catwoman on repeat for 12 hours. My favourite scary movie is The Silence of the Lambs

Name: Monstro
Description: Bonjour, my name is Monstro, Halloween is my favourite holiday of the year, I love to dance the monster mash. My fondest Halloween memory is when I dressed up as a vampire and hung out at a blood bank! My favourite scary movie is The Blair Witch Project

Name: Beatrix
Description: Ola Amigo, I am Beatrix, I love to visit Salem and hang out with my fellow witches. My fondest Halloween memory is from the time I dressed up as Glenn Beck and ate a whole pack of cookies. My favourite scary movie is The Grudge

Name: Chilombo
Description: Ola, I am Chilombo, Halloween is my favourite time of the year, I enjoy being especially spooky, I bunk off work and love to dance the monster mash. My best Halloween memory is from when I dressed up as a particularly frightening poltergeist then went to Nicolas Cage's house and got to hold his Razzie. My favourite scary movie is The Fly.

Name: Simon Saw Fingers
Description: Boo, my name is Simon saw fingers, Halloween is my favourite time of the year, I enjoy being especially spooky and love to jump out at people and scream "Boo"! I throw the best Halloween parties and love to stay up all night.

Name: Rosemary
Description: Hello, my name is Rosemary, I really love to dress my pets up as giant spiders. The greatest Halloween ever was when I dressed up as a purple coloured turtle and went to a party on a farm with the cast of Seinfeld . My favourite scary movie is Nutty Professor II: The Klumps

Name: Espiritu
Description: Boo, my name is Espiritu, I enjoy scaring people and like to sit alone in the dark, listening for ghosts. The perfect Halloween was when dressed up as a werewolf and ate cheese until I puked! My favourite scary movie is The Exorcist

Name: Gill-man
Description: Boo, my name is Gill-man, I enjoy scaring people and like to dress my pets up as gremlins. My all time favourite Halloween was when I dressed up as Hulk Hogan and ate my weight in sugar. My favourite scary movie is Train to Busan

Name: Orlok
Description: Yo, I go by the name of Orlok, I sometimes visit Salem and pretend I'm a witch. My fondest Halloween memory is when I dressed up as a vampire and went to a party in a haunted castle. Sometimes I think I can hear people moving around my house at night!

Name: Thunderhand
Description: Hey, my name is Thunderhand, I really love to dress my pets up as ghostbusters. My fondest Halloween memory is when I dressed up as a very scary Spider-Man then put a pumpkin on my head and fell down some stairs! My favourite scary movie is A Nightmare on Elm Street

Name: Torchy
Description: Yo Yo, it's me Torchy, Sometimes I ride around my city on a broomstick. Thinking back the weirdest Halloween of all time was when dressed up as a lion and went to an abandoned factory to watch Sandra Bullock rap about how how much she enjoys eating hummus. My favourite scary movie is Hellraiser

Name: Spookiny
Description: Yo, I go by the name of Spookiny, I sometimes spend time staying in haunted hotels. Thinking back, my best Halloween was when I dressed up as a scary piece of spaghetti and went to Nicolas Cage's house and got to hold his Razzie. My favourite scary movie is Dr Doolittle, there's something about a man that can speak to animals that really messes with me.

Name: Poe
Description: Boo, it's me, Poe, I really love to wear a cape and hang out at the local blood bank! Thinking back, my best Halloween was when I dressed up like a raven and ate an entire bag of chocolate all to myself. My favourite scary movie is The Hills Have Eyes

Name: Zep
Description: Word up, it's your boy, Zep! Every Halloween, I throw a Spooktacular event at my house where my friends and I tell each other the scariest stories we know.

Name: Anguirus
Description: Ola, I am Anguirus, I really like to prank call people and pretend I am a vampire! Thinking back, my best Halloween was when I dressed up as Keith Richards and went to a rave. My favourite scary movie is The Shining

Name: Skummelt
Description: Boo, I go by the name of Skummelt, Frightening people is my favourite thing to do and Halloween is my favourite day of the year, I decorate my house, carve pumpkins and in the evening I love to sit alone in the dark, listening for ghosts.

Name: Prospero
Description: Ola Amigo, I am Prospero, I love to watch the scariest of movies. The greatest Halloween ever was when dressed up as a pigeon and ate an entire bag of chocolate all to myself. My favourite scary movie is the Land Before Time

Name: Spooky Tim
Description: Boo, my name is Spooky Tim, I enjoy being the spookiest of all my friends and one Halloween I went to a party at Lou Ferrigno's house and jumped in his pool! My favourite scary movie is The Omen.

Name: Sidney
Description: Yo Yo, it's me Sidney, I enjoy being spooky and love to visit Transylvania. Thinking back, my best Halloween was when I dressed up as a zombie then went to a party in a spooky castle. I'm scared of my altcoin holdings.

Name: Bram
Description: Hey, my name is Bram, I love to scare people and wish it was Halloween every day, I decorate my house with seriously spooky decorations and then at night time I hang out in haunted mansions. The best Halloween I've ever had is when I put a lot of work into my costume and dressed up as a ghoulish Richard Gere then set off the biggest fireworks I've ever seen. My favourite scary movie is Let the Right One in

Name: Leatherface
Description: Spooky greetings to you, I'm Leatherface, I love to cook Goulash. My best Halloween memory is from when I dressed up like a magic Unicorn and snuck into the local zoo to kiss a crocodile as a dare! My favourite scary movie is Pitch Black

Description: Boo, I'm Noir, I sometimes Prank call people and pretend I am calling from the future! My best Halloween memory is from when I dressed up like a zombie lion tamer and swam in a pool full of custard! My favourite scary movie is Troll Hunter

Name: Biollante
Description: Boo, I go by the name of Biollante, I love to wear a cape and hang out at the local blood bank! The greatest Halloween ever was when I went on a boat dressed as a pirate!

Name: Chestnut
Description: Boo, I'm Chestnut, I enjoy being frightening and love to sit alone in the dark, listening for ghosts. My all time favourite Halloween is when I dressed up as Gary Busey and went to a rave. I'm terrified of my family finding out how much crypto I own.

Name: Golem

Description: Boop Boop Dawoop, it's me, Creepy toes, I am known for being the spookiest person in my neighbourhood and for throwing the best Halloween parties!

Name: Terrorfiend
Description: Ola Amigo, I am Terrorfiend, I enjoy scaring people and like to prank call people and pretend I can see them. I love to howl at the moon and eat cheese before bed.

Name: Rolo
Description: Ola, my name is Rolo, I sometimes prank call people and pretend I'm a ghost. My favourite scary movie is The Exorcist

Name: Matty K
Description: Boo, my name is Matty K, I am a creepy kaiju with the personality of a treacherous goblin, I love to cause mischief and trouble, Happy Halloween!!

Name: Fangy
Description: Bonjour, my name is Fangy, I enjoy being the spookiest of all my friends and really like to cook Goulash. The greatest Halloween ever was when I dressed up as Jerry Seinfeld and went to a party in Luigi's mansion. My favourite scary movie is Candyman

Name: Ana
Description: Hey, I am Ana, I enjoy scaring people and like to get all of my friends round to my house, set off fireworks and watch scary movies! My best Halloween memory is from when I went to a party in a haunted castle. Sometimes I think I can hear people moving around my house at night!

Name: Freddy sharp teeth
Description: Yo Yo, it's me Freddy sharp teeth, I enjoy being frightening and love to dance the monster mash. The best Halloween I've ever had is when I dressed up as a scary Spider-Man and ate an entire pizza all to myself. My favourite scary movie is Poltergeist

Name: Mr Spooky
Description: Hey, my name is Mr Spooky, Sometimes I prank call people and pretend I am a ghost! This Halloween I am going to dress up as a magical vampire hunter and go to a pizza party. I'm scared of my altcoin holdings.

Name: Venkman
Description: Boo, it's me, Venkman, Halloween is my favourite holiday of the year, I love to prank call people and pretend I can see them. The scariest Halloween I can remember is when I went to a cheese and wine party at Bruce Willis's house, he kept telling me he "could see dead people" and everyone at the party thought he was quoting the 6th Sense until we found out that earlier that day he'd witnessed a terrible car crash on his way back from work.
